casebody.data:
The State of Ohio, Appellee, v. G.L., Appellant.

[Cite as State v. G.L., 135 Ohio St.3d 136, 2012-Ohio-6089.]

*137(No. 2011-1092 Submitted December 21, 2012 Decided December 26, 2012.) Mathias H. Heck Jr., Montgomery County Prosecuting Attorney, and Laura M. Woodruff, Assistant Prosecuting Attorney, for appellee. Timothy Young, Ohio Public Defender, and Amanda Powell, Assistant Public Defender, for appellant.

{¶ 1} The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed on the authority of In re M.W., 133 Ohio St.3d 309, 2012-Ohio-4538, 978 N.E.2d 164.

O’Connor, C.J., and Lundberg Stratton, O’Donnell, Lanzinger, and Cupp, JJ., concur. Pfeifer, J., dissents. Kennedy, J., not participating.
